text: rasool usapar, jo kuchh usake rab kee or se usakee or utara, eemaan laaya aur eemaanavaale bhee, pratyek, allaah par, usake farishton par, usakee kitaabon par aur usake rasoolon par eemaan laaya. (aur unaka kahana yah hai,) "ham usake rasoolon mein se kisee ko doosare rasoolon se alag nahin karate." aur unaka kahana hai, "hamane suna aur aagyaakaaree hue. hamaare rab! ham teree kshama ke ichchhuk hai aur teree hee or lautana hai.
